verses.text: \w A|strong="H1732"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w Of|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1732"\w* Jonadab, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* former captives. \w In|strong="H1732"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H2142"\w* Lord, \w I|strong="H2142"\w* \w have|strong="H1732"\w* hoped, \w let|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H2142"\w* never \w be|strong="H1732"\w* \w put|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H1732"\w* confusion:

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy justice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w*. Incline thy ear unto \w me|strong="H5337"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H5315"\w* thou unto \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H1245"\w* God, \w a|strong="H1245"\w* protector, \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w a|strong="H1245"\w* place \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w*: \w that|strong="H5315"\w* thou mayst make \w me|strong="H5315"\w* safe. \w For|strong="H5315"\w* thou art \w my|strong="H1245"\w* firmament \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* refuge.

Deliver \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, O \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w*, \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sinner, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* transgressor \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* law \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* unjust.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* thou art \w my|strong="H3605"\w* patience, \w O|strong="H8055"\w* Lord: \w my|strong="H3605"\w* hope, \w O|strong="H8055"\w* Lord, \w from|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* youth;

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* confirmed \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* womb: \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* motherâ€™s womb thou art \w my|strong="H3068"\w* protector. \w Of|strong="H0430"\w* thee \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w continually|strong="H3068"\w* sing:
I run become unto many as a wonder, but thou art a strong helper.
Let my mouth be filled with praise, that I may sing thy glory; thy greatness all the day long.
Cast me not off in the time of old age: when my strength shall fail, do not thou forsake me.
For my enemies have spoken against me; and they that watched my soul have consulted together,
Saying: God hath forsaken him: pursue and take him, for there is none to deliver him.
O God, be not thou far from me: O my God, make haste to my help.
Let them be confounded and come to nothing that detract my soul; let them be covered with confusion and shame that seek my hurt.
But I will always hope; and will add to all thy praise.
My mouth shall shew forth thy justice; thy salvation all the day long. Because I have not known learning,
I will enter into the powers of the Lord: O Lord, I will be mindful of thy justice alone.
Thou hast taught me, O God, from my youth: and till now I will declare thy wonderful works.
And unto old age and grey hairs: O God, forsake me not, Until I shew forth thy arm to all the generation that is to come: Thy power,
And thy justice, O God, even to the highest great things thou hast done: O God, who is like to thee?
How great troubles hast thou shewn me, many and grievous: and turning thou hast brought me to life, and hast brought me back again from the depths of the earth:
Thou hast multiplied thy magnificence; and turning to me thou hast comforted me.
For I will also confess to thee thy truth with the instruments of psaltery: O God, I will sing to thee with the harp, thou holy one of Israel.
My lips shall greatly rejoice, when I shall sing to thee; and my soul which thou hast redeemed.
Yea and my tongue shall meditate on thy justice all the day; when they shall be confounded and put to shame that seek evils to me.
